job.title: Software Engineer, Intern
job.description: Our mission at Duolingo is to develop the best education in the world and make it universally available. But we’ve got more left to do — and that's where you come in!<br><br>Duolingo is the most popular language-learning application in the world, with over 500 million users and over half a billion exercises completed daily. Beyond our core learning product, we have also entered into literacy with Duolingo ABC and English proficiency testing with the Duolingo English Test .<br><br>We are passionate about educating our users, making fact-based decisions, and finding innovative solutions to complex problems. We offer meaningful work, limitless learning opportunities, and collaboration with world-class minds.<br><br>Come brighten your life and over half a billion more.<br><br><strong><u>What You’ll Do…<br></u></strong><ul> <li> Collaborate on full-stack software projects in collaboration with product design </li> <li> Develop, release, and maintain services and/or infrastructure </li> <li> Lead individual project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables </li> <li> Past Projects include: </li></ul><ul> <li> Spanish audio lessons, to improve listening comprehension </li> <li> Adding pinyin to the Chinese course </li> <li> Revamping of Achievements, a popular gamification feature </li> <li> Adding Stripe as a payment mechanism for Duolingo Plus </li> <li> Filtering out bad ads </li> <li> Improving cache performance </li> </ul> <br><br><strong><u>What We’re Looking For…<br></u></strong><ul> <li> Graduating in Spring 2023, or sooner </li> <li> Pursuing a B.S. or M.S. degree in Computer Science or related technical field (i.e. math, physics or data science) </li> <li> Knowledge of programming languages </li> <li> Dedication to our mission of accessible education </li> <li> 12 week consecutive availability </li> <li> Ability to relocate to Pittsburgh, PA </li> <br></ul><strong>Why you’ll love working here…<br></strong><ul> <li> Language learning opportunities </li> <li> Catered in-house lunches, and breakfast and dinner options </li> <li> Company-wide Hackathon </li> <li> Paid time off and company holidays </li> <li> Frequent company-wide dinners, monthly celebrations, social clubs, and so much more!</li></ul>
